summary:
This save starts you off at the Guardian Stones close to Riverwood as a male breton with some basic items and some gold to start off your adventure.
If you want to be someone else, go into the console and type: "showracemenu" without the quotes.
descriptionHtml:
This save starts you off at the Guardian Stones close to Riverwood as a male breton with some basic items and some gold to start off your adventure.
If you want to be someone else, go into the console and type: "showracemenu".
If you want to start off without any items, go into the console and type: "player.removeallitems".
If you want to get this save on your own, type: "coc guardianstones" in the console in the main menu, and then type "player.setstage mq102 30" when you spawn at the Guardian Stones. If you choose to do this you won't need this save, obviously.
This mod should in theory work in Skyrim SE as well. Of course this is on your own risk.
author: Niek Fasol
